description:
Carnivorous boys
On the day of Bunji`s karate promotion competition, Mom, who overslept, hastily came up with a simple bento. She felt sorry for Bunji, so during lunch time, she brought in a bit of food. What she saw in everyone`s bento...
Lonely Driver
Dad, who thought he would be able to enjoy a drive by himself, ending up taking Mom, Fumi, and Grandma - three women - shopping. Dad gets shuffled around by the women`s pace...
Arrival of Crisis!
Dad and Mom argued over a small thing. Both of them refuse to back down and when Bunji and Fumi saw it, they...
Two Bowls of Noodles a Day
Dad and Mom are still in the middle of an argument. Bunji and Fumi try to think of ways to make them reconcile, and use all their brain cells, but it just doesn`t work well...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Carnivorous Boys / Lonely Driver / Arrival of Crisis! / Two Bowls of Noodles a Day
肉食系男子 / ロンリー・ドライバー / 危機到来! / 一日二麺
